sources.title: The Final Option (1982) London under siege - Covert ops is the only answer - Action/Thriller
sources.description:
Elite SAS stealth meets radical ambition. When diplomacy fails, one covert op becomes the final option!  SAS Captain Peter Skellen infiltrates a radical group planning to seize the U.S. Ambassador's residence. With hostages trapped and global stakes rising, Skellen must sabotage their scheme from within before the clock runs out.

metadata.Plot: A trooper with the British Special Air Service (SAS) infiltrates a radical political group who are planning a terrorist operation against American dignitaries. A glamourized look at the methods and tactics of the famed British anti-terrorist squad.The SAS are a elite army unit which as well as its Anti terrorist role also performs covert and overt training of friendly countries armed forces and operates enemy lines.
metadata.Writer: George Markstein, Reginald Rose, James Follett
metadata.Actors: Lewis Collins, Judy Davis, Richard Widmark
